Private Equity

Introduction
expand_content
collapse_content

Wegner Law PLLC's private equity practice delivers strategic legal advice to private equity firms and portfolio companies. Our attorneys assist clients with fund formation, investments, acquisitions, and exits.

What is Private Equity?
expand_content
collapse_content

Our private equity services include fund structuring, due diligence, transaction negotiation, and regulatory compliance. We support clients through every phase of the investment lifecycle, from initial fund formation to successful exits.

Wegner Law PLLC is committed to helping private equity clients achieve their investment objectives. Our experienced attorneys provide tailored legal solutions to navigate the complexities of private equity transactions and maximize returns.

Representative Clients
expand_content
collapse_content
Representative Matters
expand_content
collapse_content
Fund Formation
Background

A private equity firm needed assistance in forming a new investment fund.

Outcome

Wegner Law PLLC structured the fund, ensuring compliance with all legal requirements and optimizing its investment strategy.

Portfolio Company Acquisition
Background

A client sought to acquire a portfolio company to expand its investment portfolio.

Outcome

Wegner Law PLLC conducted due diligence and negotiated the acquisition, resulting in a valuable addition to the client's portfolio.

Exit Strategy Implementation
Background

A private equity firm needed to exit an investment and maximize returns.

Outcome

Wegner Law PLLC developed and executed a strategic exit plan, achieving a profitable outcome for the client.
